tr_quotes.quote: Şükretmek, insan ruhunun güneşi gibidir: o olmadan çiçek açıp büyüyemeyiz.
tr_quotes.author: Jess Lair

tr_quotes.quote: Az için şükret, çoğu bulacaksın.
tr_quotes.author: Hausa Atasözü

tr_quotes.quote: En güzel düşünce biçimi müteşekkir olmaktır; şükran da mucize ile katlanmış mutluluktur.
tr_quotes.author: G.K. Chesterton

tr_quotes.quote: Hayattaki en güzel şeyler, beklenmedik anda olur, çünkü beklenti yoktur.
tr_quotes.author: Eli Khamarov

tr_quotes.quote: Bizi mutlu eden sahip olduklarımız değil, zevk aldıklarımızdır.
tr_quotes.author: John Petit-Senn

tr_quotes.quote: Olan ve olmayan her şey için çok şükür
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: İçinize ne kadar çok ışık girmesine izin verirseniz, yaşadığınız dünya da o kadar parlak olur.
tr_quotes.author: Shakti Gawain

tr_quotes.quote: Şükran, geçmişimizi anlamlandırır, bugüne huzur getirir ve yarın için bir vizyon yaratır.
tr_quotes.author: Melody Beattie

tr_quotes.quote: Takdir mükemmel bir şeydir. Başkalarındaki mükemmel şeylerin bize de ait olmasını sağlar.
tr_quotes.author: Voltaire

tr_quotes.quote: Şükür nimeti artırır.
tr_quotes.author: Hz. Ömer

tr_quotes.quote: Elhamdülillah şükrün başıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Hz. Muhammed

tr_quotes.quote: Seni vazifen Fahir değil şükür. Sana layık olan şöhret değil tevazu.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Vukûf-i zamanı nefsin ahvaline vakıf olman bu haller şeriata ve Allah’ın rızasına uygunsa şükretmen değilse istiğfar etmendir.
tr_quotes.author: Nakşibendi

tr_quotes.quote: Şükür zenginliğin süsüdür.
tr_quotes.author: Hz. Osman

tr_quotes.quote: Şükür ancak Allah’ın sana olan nimetlerinin çokluğunu ve bu nimetlerin şükründen aciz olduğunu itiraf etmendir.
tr_quotes.author: Vehbi Bin Münebbih

tr_quotes.quote: Üç bilinenli bir denklemdir hayat sabır şükür ve dua.
tr_quotes.author: Az şikâyet çok şükür seni mutluluğa götürür.

tr_quotes.quote: Mihnete şükretmeyen nimete şükretmez.
tr_quotes.author: Hatim-i Esam

tr_quotes.quote: Şükretmek surat ekşitmekse sirkeden çok şükreden yok.
tr_quotes.author: Mevlâna

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanlara şükretmeyen Allah’a da şükretmez.
tr_quotes.author: Hadis-i Şerif

tr_quotes.quote: Şükretmek kendini bu nimete ehil ve lâyık görmemektir
tr_quotes.author: Cüneyd-i Bağdadi

tr_quotes.quote: Şunu iyi bilin: İlmin şükrü ameldir amelin şükrü ise ilimdir.
tr_quotes.author: Abdullah Tusteri

tr_quotes.quote: Şükür Hakk’ın verdiğini O’nun yolunda kullanmaktır.
tr_quotes.author: Abdülhakim Arvasi

tr_quotes.quote: Nasıl ki şükür nimeti ziyadeleştirir öyle de şekva hastalığı müsibeti tezyid eder.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Nimetleri Allah’a şükrederek elde tutunuz.
tr_quotes.author: Abdülhakim Arvasi

tr_quotes.quote: Ey nimet sahibi olan kimse şükret. Şükredene Tanrı nimetini artırır.
tr_quotes.author: Yusuf Has Hacib

tr_quotes.quote: Çok şükür ki gökyüzü henüz hiçbir cüzdana sığmıyor.
tr_quotes.author: Farid Farjad

tr_quotes.quote: Gördüğü iyiliğe karşı insanlara teşekkür etmeyen Allah’a da şükretmez.
tr_quotes.author: Hz. Muhammed

tr_quotes.quote: Allah’ım bize inşallah olur diye dua edip hayalini kurduğumuz her şeyin çok şükür oldu sevincini yaşat.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Şükrünü ödediğim afiyet benim için sabrettiğin beladan daha sevimlidir.
tr_quotes.author: Mitraf Bin Abdullah

tr_quotes.quote: Şükretmedikten sonra dünyaları yesen ne fayda. Şükürle başladıktan sonra bir kuru ekmek değmez mi dünyalara.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: İyiliği görüp kıymetini takdir ederek ona karşı saygılı olmak nimetin şükrüdür.
tr_quotes.author: Ebubekir Verrak

tr_quotes.quote: Kardeşliğinin kendi hakkındaki samimi düşünce ve niyetlerine teşekkür etmeyen yaptığı iyiliklere de şükretmemiş olur.
tr_quotes.author: Hz. Ali

tr_quotes.quote: Şükrün esası nimetin sahibini bilmek bunu kalp ile itiraf etmek ve dil ile söylemektir.
tr_quotes.author: A. Geylani

tr_quotes.quote: Şükrü eda edilen az bir mal şükrüne takat getirilmeyen çok maldan daha hayırlıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Hadis-i Şerif

tr_quotes.quote: Şükür ile sabır birer binek hayvanı olsalardı hangisine önce bineceğimi kestiremezdim.
tr_quotes.author: Hz. Ömer

tr_quotes.quote: Şükür zenginliğin süsüdür.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Üç bilinenli bir denklemdir hayat: Sabır, şükür ve dua.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Az şikâyet çok şükür seni mutluluğa götürür.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Mihnete şükretmeyen nimete şükretmez.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Şükretmek surat ekşitmekse sirkeden çok şükreden yok.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanlara şükretmeyen Allah’a da şükretmez.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Şükretmek kendini bu nimete ehil ve lâyık görmemektir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Biz şükredenleri mükâfatlandıracağız.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Şunu iyi bilin: İlmin şükrü ameldir amelin şükrü ise ilimdir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Şükür Hakk’ın verdiğini onun yolunda kullanmaktır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Nasıl ki şükür nimeti ziyadeleştirir öyle de şekva hastalığı müsibeti tezyid eder.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Nimetleri Allah’a şükrederek elde tutunuz.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Çok şükür ki gökyüzü henüz hiçbir cüzdana sığmıyor.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Gördüğü iyiliğe karşı insanlara teşekkür etmeyen Allah’a da şükretmez.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Allah’ım bize inşallah olur diye dua edip hayalini kurduğumuz her şeyin çok şükür oldu sevincini yaşat.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Şükrünü ödediğim afiyet benim için sabrettiğin beladan daha sevimlidir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

en_quotes.quote: Be thankful we're not getting all the government we're paying for
en_quotes.author: Will Rogers

en_quotes.quote: I'm very blessed, thankful, grateful for the opportunities I've had
en_quotes.author: Christen Press

en_quotes.quote: I have a lot to be thankful for. I am healthy, happy and I am loved
en_quotes.author: Reba McEntire

en_quotes.quote: I am even thankful for the negative things that have made me a stronger and better person
en_quotes.author: Joanna Krupa

en_quotes.quote: I have so much to be thankful for
en_quotes.author: Alyssa Edwards

en_quotes.quote: Strive to find things to be thankful for, and just look for the good in who you are!
en_quotes.author: Bethany Hamilton

en_quotes.quote: Gratitude is the fairest blossom which springs from the soul
en_quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

en_quotes.quote: I'm just thankful I'm surrounded by good people
en_quotes.author: Jon Pardi

en_quotes.quote: When you practice gratefulness, there is a sense of respect toward others
en_quotes.author: Dalai Lama

en_quotes.quote: The thankful receiver bears a plentiful harvest
en_quotes.author: William Blake

en_quotes.quote: When it comes to life the critical thing is whether you take things for granted or take them with gratitude
en_quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

en_quotes.quote: I am what I am, I'm doing very well in my life, and I'm thankful to God for that
en_quotes.author: LL Cool J

en_quotes.quote: Gratitude is not only the greatest of virtues, but the parent of all the others
en_quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

en_quotes.quote: The trick is to be grateful when your mood is high and graceful when it is low
en_quotes.author: Richard Carlson

en_quotes.quote: Feeling gratitude and not expressing it is like wrapping a present and not giving it
en_quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

en_quotes.quote: Be thankful for problems. If they were less difficult, someone with less ability might have your job
en_quotes.author: Jim Lovell

en_quotes.quote: When a person doesn't have gratitude, something is missing in his or her humanity
en_quotes.author: Elie Wiesel

en_quotes.quote: Gratitude is the most exquisite form of courtesy
en_quotes.author: Jacques Maritain

en_quotes.quote: Keep your eyes open to your mercies. The man who forgets to be thankful has fallen asleep in life
en_quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

en_quotes.quote: Gratitude is the sign of noble souls
en_quotes.author: Aesop

en_quotes.quote: We have to be thankful for what we have. A lot of kids would love to be in our situation, and we realize that
en_quotes.author: Cole Sprouse

en_quotes.quote: Thank you for life, and all the little ups and downs that make it worth living
en_quotes.author: Travis Barker

en_quotes.quote: Be thankful for all successes, lose your ego, take risks, fail fast, and if you don't absolutely love what you do, run!
en_quotes.author: Cynthia Rowley

en_quotes.quote: Does not the gratitude of the dog put to shame any man who is ungrateful to his benefactors?
en_quotes.author: Saint Basil

en_quotes.quote: I feel grateful because I have a lot of love in my life. I found the person I'm sharing my life with. I have a good man
en_quotes.author: Gisele Bundchen

en_quotes.quote: I'm grateful for always this moment, the now, no matter what form it takes
en_quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

en_quotes.quote: I am thankful I can see much to admire in all religions
en_quotes.author: Alfred Russel Wallace

en_quotes.quote: The hardest arithmetic to master is that which enables us to count our blessings
en_quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

en_quotes.quote: I'm thankful to God that my life changed, but I'm also still on my grind
en_quotes.author: Tory Lanez

en_quotes.quote: We are in a wrong state of mind if we are not in a thankful state of mind
en_quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

en_quotes.quote: Some people are always grumbling because roses have thorns; I am thankful that thorns have roses
en_quotes.author: Alphonse Karr

en_quotes.quote: My advice: Take a second out of the day today and be thankful for your family
en_quotes.author: Jenna Morasca

en_quotes.quote: I'm very humbled and honored. I'm very thankful to the Asian-American Community for all their support!
en_quotes.author: Jeremy Lin

en_quotes.quote: I would maintain that thanks are the highest form of thought, and that gratitude is happiness doubled by wonder
en_quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

en_quotes.quote: If a fellow isn't thankful for what he's got, he isn't likely to be thankful for what he's going to get
en_quotes.author: Frank A. Clark

en_quotes.quote: I want to be as gracious and thankful as I can because it has been a long road
en_quotes.author: Maren Morris

en_quotes.quote: I certainly lead a different life from many people. I have a great life that I am thankful for, and I like travelling
en_quotes.author: Lewis Hamilton

en_quotes.quote: I have got good films, and I am thankful to Aditya Chopra. He put a lot of faith in me
en_quotes.author: Anushka Sharma

en_quotes.quote: I am thankful, of course, for the prize and thankful to God for each story, each idea, each word, each day
en_quotes.author: Isaac Bashevis Singer

en_quotes.quote: I'm thankful to be breathing, on this side of the grass. Whatever comes, comes
en_quotes.author: Ron Perlman

en_quotes.quote: I am really thankful to everyone around, as Mumbai has given me a lot
en_quotes.author: Kratika Sengar

en_quotes.quote: I wouldn't change anything. I've made mistakes, but thanks to those mistakes, I've learned
en_quotes.author: Enrique Iglesias

en_quotes.quote: I'm thankful for every moment
en_quotes.author: Al Green

en_quotes.quote: Before I get out of bed, I am saying thank you. I know how important it is to be thankful
en_quotes.author: Al Jarreau

en_quotes.quote: If you suffer, thank God! It is a sure sign that you are alive
en_quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

en_quotes.quote: Joy is the simplest form of gratitude
en_quotes.author: Karl Barth

en_quotes.quote: I'm so happy and thankful I made it a point be a stay-at-home mom
en_quotes.author: Candace Cameron Bure

en_quotes.quote: Never take anything for granted
en_quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

en_quotes.quote: No matter what, our American Army is so big, and we are so very thankful to them
en_quotes.author: Suga

en_quotes.quote: Let us be grateful to the mirror for revealing to us our appearance only
en_quotes.author: Samuel Butler

en_quotes.quote: I do not so much rejoice that God hath made me to be a Queen, as to be a Queen over so thankful a people
en_quotes.author: Elizabeth I

en_quotes.quote: No duty is more urgent than that of returning thanks
en_quotes.author: James Allen

en_quotes.quote: I am thankful for laughter, except when milk comes out of my nose
en_quotes.author: Woody Allen

en_quotes.quote: I'm very thankful to be doing what I'm doing. I feel very blessed
en_quotes.author: Justin Timberlake

en_quotes.quote: If you are really thankful, what do you do? You share
en_quotes.author: W. Clement Stone

en_quotes.quote: I am thankful that 'Jhalak' made me a professional dancer now from just a 'barat' dancer
en_quotes.author: Ashish Sharma

en_quotes.quote: There's no happier person than a truly thankful, content person
en_quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

en_quotes.quote: I was very thankful that my mother was a very strong mom. She was mom and dad. She is mom and dad. She is my hero
en_quotes.author: Ryan Frazier

en_quotes.quote: Gratitude is a duty which ought to be paid, but which none have a right to expect
en_quotes.author: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

en_quotes.quote: God has two dwellings; one in heaven, and the other in a meek and thankful heart
en_quotes.author: Izaak Walton

en_quotes.quote: Most people repent their sins by thanking God they ain't so wicked as their neighbors
en_quotes.author: Josh Billings

en_quotes.quote: Gratitude changes the pangs of memory into a tranquil joy
en_quotes.author: Dietrich Bonhoeffer

en_quotes.quote: I think being thankful is very important, and being thankful means you're choosing to be kind
en_quotes.author: Jacob Tremblay

en_quotes.quote: I am very thankful and blessed to have a healthy and happy baby boy and baby mama
en_quotes.author: Eric Church

en_quotes.quote: Immensely grateful, touched, proud, astonished, abashed
en_quotes.author: Boris Pasternak

en_quotes.quote: Sometimes we need to remind ourselves that thankfulness is indeed a virtue
en_quotes.author: William Bennett

en_quotes.quote: I have nothing to ask for, thanks to God. Everything I have, God has given me
en_quotes.author: Mariano Rivera

en_quotes.quote: I'm thankful that l I have an amazing family, black women that raised me
en_quotes.author: LeToya Luckett

en_quotes.quote: Thanks to television, for the first time the young are seeing history made before it is censored by their elders
en_quotes.author: Margaret Mead

en_quotes.quote: I'm grateful for my brokenness. I'm grateful for my humility
en_quotes.author: James McGreevey

en_quotes.quote: I'm thankful for weird people out there 'cause they're some of the most creative people
en_quotes.author: Channing Tatum

en_quotes.quote: A proud man is seldom a grateful man, for he never thinks he gets as much as he deserves
en_quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

en_quotes.quote: Looking back, I am thankful that I didn't go into the film industry
en_quotes.author: Hideo Kojima

en_quotes.quote: All our discontents about what we want appeared to spring from the want of thankfulness for what we have
en_quotes.author: Daniel Defoe

en_quotes.quote: Thankfully, while our self-righteousness reaches far, God's grace reaches farther
en_quotes.author: Tullian Tchividjian

en_quotes.quote: Should it happen tomorrow, I would fall to my knees to give thanks to God for such a career
en_quotes.author: Placido Domingo

en_quotes.quote: I'm one of the most fortunate people in the world
en_quotes.author: Rose Kennedy

en_quotes.quote: I am thankful to my parents. They have done many sacrifices
en_quotes.author: P. V. Sindhu

en_quotes.quote: I'm very thankful that I can make people happy just by signing my name
en_quotes.author: Yoko Ono

en_quotes.quote: By and large, the gospel of grace is neither proclaimed, understood, nor lived
en_quotes.author: Brennan Manning

en_quotes.quote: Both of my grandfathers were in the service. It's one of those things that you can't be thankful enough for
en_quotes.author: Luke Combs

en_quotes.quote: I'm just very thankful. And I say that a lot because that's the most important message
en_quotes.author: Pharrell Williams

en_quotes.quote: Radio got behind me, and I'm very thankful for it
en_quotes.author: Kane Brown

en_quotes.quote: I realize how unique my path has been. And I'm thankful for that
en_quotes.author: Vanessa Paradis

en_quotes.quote: Drink and be thankful to the host! What seems insignificant when you have it, is important when you need it
en_quotes.author: Franz Grillparzer

en_quotes.quote: Let a nation's fervent thanks make some amends for the toils and sufferings of those who survive
en_quotes.author: Edward Everett

en_quotes.quote: I am incredibly thankful for the strong support I have from my peers in the industry and of course my amazing fans
en_quotes.author: Miranda Lambert

en_quotes.quote: I'm from Canada, so Thanksgiving to me is just Thursday with more food. And I'm thankful for that
en_quotes.author: Howie Mandel

en_quotes.quote: A single grateful thought toward heaven is the most perfect prayer
en_quotes.author: Gotthold Ephraim Lessing

en_quotes.quote: I'm so thankful that Mum taught me to cook, because not every day is a takeaway day
en_quotes.author: Big Narstie

en_quotes.quote: For what I have received may the Lord make me truly thankful. And more truly for what I have not received
en_quotes.author: Storm Jameson

en_quotes.quote: In my case, my mother had to be my mother and father, so I am thankful to her
en_quotes.author: Henrikh Mkhitaryan

en_quotes.quote: I'm thankful that I have lived long enough to become a legend, and I hope I deserve it
en_quotes.author: Ralph Stanley

en_quotes.quote: Unseasonable kindness gets no thanks
en_quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

en_quotes.quote: I'm thankful to my family, friends, and fans for all of their support
en_quotes.author: Serena Williams

en_quotes.quote: If I can do one hundredth part for the Indian that Mrs. Stowe did for the Negro, I will be thankful
en_quotes.author: Helen Hunt Jackson

en_quotes.quote: Thankfully, we didn't stop at Malta. I think Malta was thankful, too
en_quotes.author: Spike Milligan

en_quotes.quote: You can expect nothing in being a musician, and you have to be just very thankful every time it goes positively for you
en_quotes.author: Halsey

en_quotes.quote: Vince McMahon made me a much better businessman, and I'm super thankful to him
en_quotes.author: Diamond Dallas Page

en_quotes.quote: I am thankful to all those who gave me opportunities in the film industry
en_quotes.author: S. Sreesanth

en_quotes.quote: Many of our prayers were not answered, and for this we are now grateful
en_quotes.author: William Feather

en_quotes.quote: I will always be thankful to WWE for letting me be the voice of SmackDown Live and bring it to the USA Network
en_quotes.author: Mauro Ranallo

en_quotes.quote: I'm thankful to have time to write
en_quotes.author: Paul Watson

en_quotes.quote: I'm thankful that I was able to have a long, healthy career for the most part
en_quotes.author: Scottie Pippen

en_quotes.quote: Feeling gratitude isn't born in us - it's something we are taught, and in turn, we teach our children
en_quotes.author: Joyce Brothers

en_quotes.quote: I'm thankful to be here in Cleveland, and I believe this is where I belong
en_quotes.author: Josh Gordon

en_quotes.quote: I do think that Thanksgiving is a very nice holiday because it's all about saying thank you; it's being thankful
en_quotes.author: Jacob Tremblay

en_quotes.quote: I'm just thankful to be blessed with my talent
en_quotes.author: Ty Dolla Sign

en_quotes.quote: I'm happy and thankful that people are messing with the Dolla $ign
en_quotes.author: Ty Dolla Sign

en_quotes.quote: I'm thankful I am able to continue to share the joy and the inspiration tap brings
en_quotes.author: Savion Glover

en_quotes.quote: I'm thankful for all the support I've received over the years
en_quotes.author: Big K.R.I.T.

en_quotes.quote: I am very thankful to Washington, D.C. for their loyalty and support
en_quotes.author: Raheem DeVaughn

en_quotes.quote: I'm not going to tell you to meditate on what Christmas really means and be thankful
en_quotes.author: Monica Johnson

en_quotes.quote: I found out that superstars Winkler and William Shatner are real people, and I was so thankful for that
en_quotes.author: Terry Bradshaw

en_quotes.quote: Well, there's not a day goes by when I don't get up and say thank you to somebody
en_quotes.author: Rod Stewart

en_quotes.quote: I'm very thankful and very blessed to have the opportunity to play this game
en_quotes.author: Reggie Miller

en_quotes.quote: I'm thankful for the three ounce Ziploc bag, so that I have somewhere to put my savings
en_quotes.author: Paula Poundstone

en_quotes.quote: I'm thankful that my memory is good because my vision is going
en_quotes.author: Paula Poundstone

en_quotes.quote: They were some of the best years of my life, and I'm so thankful I was able to go to Stanford
en_quotes.author: Kelley O'Hara

en_quotes.quote: When you read a piece of writing that you admire, send a note of thanks to the author
en_quotes.author: Sherman Alexie

en_quotes.quote: I am thankful to my audience, parents, and the media who have supported me over the years
en_quotes.author: Govinda

en_quotes.quote: It's important you stay professional and keep working, and I'm thankful for everything that's happened to me
en_quotes.author: Dele Alli

en_quotes.quote: There's no ex out there who I'm not friends with today, and I'm extremely thankful for that
en_quotes.author: Taylor Lautner

en_quotes.quote: With life and grandkids and the whole thing, every day is busy, but I'm so thankful to God that I'm still here
en_quotes.author: Gary Rossington

en_quotes.quote: I'm so thankful to everyone who has helped me along the way
en_quotes.author: Zach Ertz

en_quotes.quote: There's definitely no hard feelings with WWE. I'm very thankful to them for the opportunity that was given to me
en_quotes.author: Rey Mysterio

en_quotes.quote: I'm very happy that major players are always giving their opinions about my life, my game. I am very thankful for that
en_quotes.author: Neymar

en_quotes.quote: To be able to make a living doing what I love is truly a gift, and I'm thankful for that every day
en_quotes.author: Mike McCready

en_quotes.quote: A great deal of who I am is down to Barca and La Masia - I am very thankful to them
en_quotes.author: Andres Iniesta

en_quotes.quote: I'm just really thankful to have the chance to portray a character you don't see every day
en_quotes.author: Regina King

en_quotes.quote: I'm very thankful to the Yankees and to Major League Baseball for allowing me to play this game
en_quotes.author: Alex Rodriguez

en_quotes.quote: My music is my No. 1, and I've got people who believe in me and keep me going. I'm thankful
en_quotes.author: Jon Pardi

en_quotes.quote: I'm thankful I grew up the way I did. It made me a hard worker and insightful to other people's lives
en_quotes.author: Rachel Roy

en_quotes.quote: I'm just thankful to have a tour and work something I can focus on
en_quotes.author: Jerry Cantrell

en_quotes.quote: I'm just really, really thankful. I'm thankful to the doctors; I'm thankful to the family that donated the kidney
en_quotes.author: Natalie Cole

en_quotes.quote: I am really thankful to the audiences that they have appreciated all my songs and I have managed to touch their soul
en_quotes.author: Mohit Chauhan

en_quotes.quote: Certainly the research shows that grateful people are more innovative thinkers
en_quotes.author: Deborah Norville

en_quotes.quote: I'm so thankful that there are people willing to do that - to actually carry a child nine months for someone
en_quotes.author: GloZell

en_quotes.quote: I learn more with every job, and I'm very thankful for where I am
en_quotes.author: Liam Hemsworth

en_quotes.quote: I wouldn't be where I am without my fans, and I am very thankful for them
en_quotes.author: Kygo

en_quotes.quote: My work in Africa was paid for mostly by American Christians, and I am so thankful for their giving hearts
en_quotes.author: Reinhard Bonnke

en_quotes.quote: I'm actual thankful for the amount of responsibility that has been handed to me. I feel very honored
en_quotes.author: Samira Wiley

en_quotes.quote: I am really excited and thankful for opportunity to work with Cotto Promotions, Tidal and Roc Nation
en_quotes.author: Yandel

en_quotes.quote: I am thankful to all the love that I have received from my fans
en_quotes.author: Shaheer Sheikh

en_quotes.quote: I am thankful to all the people who have loved and listened to me
en_quotes.author: Asha Bhosle

en_quotes.quote: I'm thankful for each and every day. We never know when time is up
en_quotes.author: Chuck Berry

en_quotes.quote: I'm thankful for performing as long as I am allowed
en_quotes.author: Chuck Berry

en_quotes.quote: But I'm very thankful that no one is slamming my head against the wall anymore
en_quotes.author: Harry Anderson

en_quotes.quote: Dear Lord, I'm so grateful I'm still loved
en_quotes.author: Vivien Leigh

en_quotes.quote: I'm so thankful to have been born in the times that we live in
en_quotes.author: Matt Bomer

en_quotes.quote: I feel very, very thankful to have the family that I do
en_quotes.author: Matt Bomer

en_quotes.quote: I'm thankful to get the opportunity to direct. I hope I don't mess it up
en_quotes.author: Mark Harmon

en_quotes.quote: I'm so thankful for the active obedience of Christ. No hope without it
en_quotes.author: John Gresham Machen

en_quotes.quote: I feel thankful for everything I achieved
en_quotes.author: Simona Halep

en_quotes.quote: I am thankful for this title of champion emeritus and proud I never lost my title
en_quotes.author: Vitali Klitschko

en_quotes.quote: I'm so thankful that I had music to turn to in the dark times and be able to understand myself through it
en_quotes.author: Flying Lotus

en_quotes.quote: I was in the postseason twice and I'm thankful for that
en_quotes.author: Ryne Sandberg

en_quotes.quote: I'm thankful for serendipitous moments in my life, where things could've gone the other way
en_quotes.author: Rick Springfield

en_quotes.quote: I've had bad jobs. Now I have a good one. I'm thankful
en_quotes.author: Maurice Greene

en_quotes.quote: I could not be more thankful to those who voted me through and believed in me
en_quotes.author: Brynn Cartelli

en_quotes.quote: I'm very thankful; I'm very appreciative for everything that the Denver Broncos organization has done for me
en_quotes.author: Brock Osweiler

en_quotes.quote: And I'm so thankful that I've been allowed to show another side of Trish
en_quotes.author: Trish Stratus

en_quotes.quote: I am really thankful for my career
en_quotes.author: Rob Van Dam

en_quotes.quote: I mean you got to thank your parents for giving you the right genes
en_quotes.author: Eric Heiden

en_quotes.quote: I'm just thankful that I continue to do therapy because it makes the world a better place
en_quotes.author: Farrah Abraham

en_quotes.quote: I'm thankful for my songs being at the top of the charts but I am human - I think people still have to remember that
en_quotes.author: Delta Goodrem

en_quotes.quote: I'm so happy to have all this support from everyone around the world, and I'm forever thankful for all of them
en_quotes.author: Chloe Kim

en_quotes.quote: I feel so thankful that I'm able to be a part of something that I love to wake up and run to work every day
en_quotes.author: Alexander Wang

en_quotes.quote: I'm so thankful every day
en_quotes.author: Yahya Abdul-Mateen II

en_quotes.quote: I'm thankful for not ever taking anything illegal
en_quotes.author: Pedro Martinez

en_quotes.quote: I'm so thankful that I got to travel from a relatively young age
en_quotes.author: Abigail Spencer

en_quotes.quote: Derek McInnes gave me that platform to showcase what I can do, so I'm thankful
en_quotes.author: James Maddison

en_quotes.quote: I'll always be thankful to Villa for giving me the chance to play first-team football regularly
en_quotes.author: Kyle Walker

en_quotes.quote: When you solve a problem, you ought to thank God and go on to the next one
en_quotes.author: Dean Rusk

en_quotes.quote: I'm very thankful to Bellator
en_quotes.author: Tito Ortiz

en_quotes.quote: My fans are definitely my shareholders, and I'm extremely thankful for them
en_quotes.author: Jacob Whitesides

en_quotes.quote: The act is unjustifiable that either begs for a blessing, or, having succeeded gives no thanksgiving
en_quotes.author: Merle Shain

en_quotes.quote: I work hard, and I'm thankful people recognize that
en_quotes.author: Ander Crenshaw

en_quotes.quote: I am very thankful and blessed that I haven't had to sell my soul and be anything that I'm not
en_quotes.author: Big Narstie

en_quotes.quote: I'm so thankful for that struggling period. That time is really great where you have no idea what's going to happen
en_quotes.author: Abbi Jacobson

en_quotes.quote: I'm proud - or really more thankful than anything - for all the work that I've gotten
en_quotes.author: Annie Ilonzeh

en_quotes.quote: It feels really grateful, thankful, and happy when your work is appreciated
en_quotes.author: Vikrant Massey

en_quotes.quote: I'm thankful for everything good and bad that happened to our band
en_quotes.author: Matt Skiba

en_quotes.quote: I'm really thankful for the time that I grew up in that we didn't have cell phones, and we made a lot of our own fun
en_quotes.author: Matt Skiba

en_quotes.quote: I think it's important to say that I am genuinely thankful for the time at Bellator
en_quotes.author: Eddie Alvarez

en_quotes.quote: I'm very thankful I'm finding my way, and people are excited to bring me into roles that demand a certain complexity
en_quotes.author: Nicholas D'Agosto

en_quotes.quote: I'm just very pleased and thankful that there was a receptive audience of people that I was able to connect with
en_quotes.author: Fab Five Freddy

en_quotes.quote: I'm so thankful and blessed for the Heat organization
en_quotes.author: Penny Hardaway

en_quotes.quote: I just take things one day at a time. I'm just thankful that I have my legs, my arms, my eyes
en_quotes.author: Fantastic Negrito

en_quotes.quote: Who wouldn't be thankful for another medal?
en_quotes.author: Tori Bowie

en_quotes.quote: I have devoted my life to serving the people of New Jersey and am forever thankful for all who have stood by me
en_quotes.author: Bob Menendez

en_quotes.quote: I'm really thankful for my improv background
en_quotes.author: Lauren Lapkus

en_quotes.quote: I'm just thankful for gigs
en_quotes.author: Tony Hale

en_quotes.quote: I'm really thankful for the popularity of 'Strong Woman Do Bong Soon,' but I know it's only temporary
en_quotes.author: Park Bo-young

en_quotes.quote: Having the support I have from a lot of people all over the world can't be a bad thing. I am thankful for that
en_quotes.author: Mick Schumacher

en_quotes.quote: I'm just thankful that we were able to reach out to so many different fans that didn't know what our music was
en_quotes.author: Tiffany Hwang

en_quotes.quote: I'm so thankful for my one year at regular high school in White Plains
en_quotes.author: Jennifer Damiano

en_quotes.quote: I still don't look at myself as a star. I've always had a thankful heart
en_quotes.author: Brenda Lee

en_quotes.quote: I've done it all. I'm thankful and proud of what I've accomplished in my life. I hope to keep doing it
en_quotes.author: Ralph Stanley

en_quotes.quote: I'm thankful to say that I already have my dream job. I wouldn't trade it for anything
en_quotes.author: Nathan Kress

en_quotes.quote: Such lovely warmth of thought and delicacy of colour are beyond all praise, and equally beyond all thanks!
en_quotes.author: Marie Corelli

en_quotes.quote: I'm thankful I don't have parents that I feel I need to get their attention. They've always been there for me
en_quotes.author: Cierra Ramirez

en_quotes.quote: The worst moment for the atheist is when he is really thankful and has nobody to thank
en_quotes.author: Dante Gabriel Rossetti

en_quotes.quote: He enjoys much who is thankful for little
en_quotes.author: Thomas Secker
